summary: This bill, the Muslim Brotherhood Terrorist Designation Act of 2025, mandates the President to designate the Muslim Brotherhood as a foreign terrorist organization. It directs the Secretary of State to submit annual reports identifying Muslim Brotherhood branches and assessing whether their activities meet the criteria for such a designation. The bill also amends the Anti-Terrorism Act of 1987 to include the Muslim Brotherhood and its affiliates as terrorist organizations, and it imposes immigration restrictions and sanctions on Muslim Brotherhood members.
